resources.string: This app adds to the default android file manger (SAF), FTP client abilities
To add an FTP server you need to create a new FTP account that will appear in the android\'s accounts section, to do so click this button
To open the android file manager (SAF) you can use this button because some OEMs hide it because they don\'t understand its true power
If the ftp account doesn\'t appear in the side view, you need to clear all the data of this app because the android file manager (SAF) hasn\'t update its accounts yet
